statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%'
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_feedback
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT feedback, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY feedback ORDER BY feedback_count DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT feedback) AS unique_feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY highest_score DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.7;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(sentiment_score) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%poor%' OR sentiment_score < 0.3;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) < 0.4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback IN ('Good', 'Excellent');
SELECT customer_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL GROUP BY customer_id HAVING MAX(sentiment_score) > 0.8;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_details WHERE age > 30);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_details WHERE gender = 'Female') GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score = (SELECT MIN(sentiment_score) FROM customer_feedback);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, date_posted FROM feedback WHERE date_posted > '2021-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, f.sentiment_score  FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(f.feedback_id) as num_feedbacks FROM customers c LEFT JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING num_feedbacks > 1;
SELECT c.customer_name, AVG(f.sentiment_score) as avg_sentiment_score FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(sentiment_score) as max_sentiment_score FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, MIN(f.sentiment_score) as min_sentiment_score FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(f.sentiment_score) as total_sentiment_score FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, f.sentiment_score, f.date_posted FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id ORDER BY f.date_posted DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, AVG(f.sentiment_score) as avg_sentiment_score FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.date_posted > '2021-06-01' GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, f.feedback_text FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.feedback_text LIKE '%good%' OR f.feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) as num_feedbacks FROM customers c LEFT JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(sentiment_score) as total_sentiment_score FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.date_posted > '2021-01-01' GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_sentiment_score FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 3.0;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, date_posted FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback.sentiment_score < 2.5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, DATE(date_posted) AS date_posted FROM customers LEFT JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE sentiment_score > 4.0;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM feedback WHERE date_posted >= '2022-01-01' AND date_posted <= '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_sentiment_score FROM feedback WHERE date_posted >= '2022-01-01' AND date_posted <= '2022-06-30' GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, feedback_text, sentiment_score, date_posted FROM customers LEFT JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE date_posted BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 5;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) < 3.0;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, feedback_text, date_posted FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 4.5);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_sentiment_score FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT survey_id, rating FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT * FROM review_sentiment;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, sentiment_score FROM review_sentiment;
SELECT review_text FROM review_sentiment;
SELECT * FROM support_services;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM support_services;
SELECT service_id, feedback_id FROM support_services;

SELECT feedback_survey.survey_id, feedback_survey.rating, review_sentiment.sentiment_score FROM feedback_survey INNER JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id;

SELECT feedback_survey.feedback, review_sentiment.review_text, support_services.service_name FROM feedback_survey INNER JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id INNER JOIN support_services ON feedback_survey.customer_id = support_services.feedback_id;

SELECT feedback_survey.survey_id, review_sentiment.review_id, support_services.service_id, support_services.service_name FROM feedback_survey INNER JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id INNER JOIN support_services ON feedback_survey.customer_id = support_services.feedback_id;

SELECT feedback_survey.survey_id, feedback_survey.rating, review_sentiment.sentiment_score, review_sentiment.review_text FROM feedback_survey LEFT JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id;

SELECT feedback_survey.survey_id, feedback_survey.rating, review_sentiment.sentiment_score, review_sentiment.review_text FROM feedback_survey RIGHT JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id;

SELECT feedback_survey.survey_id, feedback_survey.rating, review_sentiment.sentiment_score, review_sentiment.review_text FROM feedback_survey FULL JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id;

SELECT feedback_survey.survey_id, feedback_survey.rating, review_sentiment.sentiment_score, review_sentiment.review_text, support_services.service_name FROM feedback_survey INNER JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id INNER JOIN support_services ON feedback_survey.customer_id = support_services.feedback_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT AVG(rating) as average_rating FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) as max_sentiment_score FROM review_sentiment;
SELECT MIN(rating) as min_rating FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM support_services;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) FROM feedback_survey GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM review_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT survey_id, feedback FROM feedback_survey WHERE LENGTH(feedback) > 100;
SELECT service_type, COUNT(service_id) FROM support_services GROUP BY service_type;
SELECT review_text FROM review_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id;
SELECT service_name, feedback FROM support_services JOIN feedback_survey ON support_services.feedback_id = feedback_survey.survey_id;
SELECT service_id, service_name, rating FROM support_services JOIN feedback_survey ON support_services.feedback_id = feedback_survey.survey_id WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM review_sentiment WHERE review_id IN (SELECT review_id FROM review_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5);
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) FROM review_sentiment GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.8;
SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM support_services ORDER BY service_type;
SELECT survey_id, rating, sentiment_score FROM feedback_survey JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id;
SELECT survey_id, feedback, sentiment_score FROM feedback_survey JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT service_type, AVG(rating) FROM support_services JOIN feedback_survey ON support_services.feedback_id = feedback_survey.survey_id GROUP BY service_type;
SELECT service_name, feedback FROM support_services JOIN feedback_survey ON support_services.feedback_id = feedback_survey.survey_id WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;

SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM feedback_survey JOIN review_sentiment ON feedback_survey.customer_id = review_sentiment.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE survey_id IN (SELECT survey_id FROM support_services WHERE service_type = 'Support');
SELECT survey_id, rating, service_name FROM feedback_survey JOIN support_services ON feedback_survey.survey_id = support_services.feedback_id;
SELECT survey_id, rating, service_type FROM feedback_survey JOIN support_services ON feedback_survey.survey_id = support_services.feedback_id WHERE rating <= 3;
SELECT service_id, service_name, feedback FROM support_services JOIN feedback_survey ON support_services.feedback_id = feedback_survey.survey_id WHERE LENGTH(feedback) > 50;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM SurveyResponses WHERE satisfaction_score < 3;
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM ReviewAnalysis;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE helpful_votes > 10;
SELECT * FROM SupportServices;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM SupportServices;
SELECT service_name, support_rating FROM SupportServices WHERE support_rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM SurveyResponses WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT review_id, review_text, sentiment_score FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE helpful_votes > 5;
SELECT service_id, service_name, support_category FROM SupportServices WHERE support_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE customer_id = 'xyz456';
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE review_id = '123abc';
SELECT * FROM SupportServices WHERE service_id = '456xyz';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123456';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE satisfaction_score >= 8;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE customer_id = '654321';
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE helpful_votes > 10;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM SupportServices WHERE support_rating >= 4;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM SupportServices WHERE support_category = 'Technical';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN SurveyResponses ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = SurveyResponses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis JOIN SupportServices ON ReviewAnalysis.sentiment_score > 0.6 AND SupportServices.support_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN SurveyResponses ON CustomerFeedback.sentiment_score > 0.7 AND SurveyResponses.satisfaction_score >= 7;
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis JOIN SupportServices ON ReviewAnalysis.helpful_votes > 5 AND SupportServices.support_rating >= 4;
SELECT CustomerFeedback.customer_id, SurveyResponses.satisfaction_score FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN SurveyResponses ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = SurveyResponses.customer_id;

SELECT CustomerFeedback.customer_id, CustomerFeedback.sentiment_score, SurveyResponses.satisfaction_score FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN SurveyResponses ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = SurveyResponses.customer_id WHERE CustomerFeedback.sentiment_score > 0.5 AND SurveyResponses.satisfaction_score >= 8;

SELECT CustomerFeedback.customer_id, ReviewAnalysis.sentiment_score, SupportServices.support_rating FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN ReviewAnalysis ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = ReviewAnalysis.review_id JOIN SupportServices ON ReviewAnalysis.sentiment_score > 0.6 AND SupportServices.support_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE review_text ILIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT * FROM SupportServices WHERE support_name = '24/7 Support';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, rating FROM surveys;
SELECT feedback FROM surveys WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_text FROM reviews;
SELECT customer_id, review_date FROM reviews WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_date, status FROM support_tickets;
SELECT issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_label FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT review_id, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Closed';
SELECT review_id, sentiment_label FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_label = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John');
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT review_id, review_date FROM reviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND issue_description LIKE '%network%';
SELECT review_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_label = 'Positive';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM surveys GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT * FROM surveys s JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM reviews r JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON r.review_id = sa.review_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM customers c LEFT JOIN support_tickets st ON c.customer_id = st.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT survey_id, rating, sentiment_label FROM surveys s JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON s.survey_id = sa.review_id WHERE rating > 3 AND sentiment_label = 'Positive';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customers c JOIN surveys s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT review_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis sa LEFT JOIN reviews r ON sa.review_id = r.review_id ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM surveys;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM surveys WHERE rating < 3);
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM reviews r JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON r.review_id = sa.review_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.5;
SELECT survey_id, rating, feedback FROM surveys UNION SELECT NULL, NULL, issue_description FROM support_tickets;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM customers c JOIN reviews r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
